TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FolderBrowserDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public NotInheritable Class FolderBrowserDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FolderBrowserDialog sealed : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

span.span: Prompts the user to select a folder.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供一种提示用户浏览、创建和最终选择文件夹的方法。This class provides a way to prompt the user to browse, create, and eventually select a folder. 当你只想允许用户选择文件夹而不是文件时，请使用此类。Use this class when you only want to allow the user to select folders, not files. 浏览文件夹是通过树控件进行的。Browsing of the folders is done through a tree control. 只能选择文件系统中的文件夹;虚拟文件夹不能。Only folders from the file system can be selected; virtual folders cannot. 通常，在创建新的后， 将设置 为从中开始浏览的位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. 或者，您可以将设置 为最初选择的子文件夹的绝对路径 。Optionally, you can set the to an absolute path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 还可以选择将属性设置 为向用户提供其他说明。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最后，调用 方法以向用户显示对话框。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 当对话框关闭并且对话框结果 为时 ， 将是一个字符串，其中包含指向所选文件夹的路径。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog box result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 您可以使用 属性来控制用户是否能够使用 " **新建文件夹** " 按钮创建新文件夹。You can use the property to control if the user is able to create new folders with the **New Folder** button. 是模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它会阻止应用程序的其余部分，直到用户选择了一个文件夹。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 当对话框模式显示时，无输入 (键盘或鼠标单击) 可能发生，但对话框中的对象除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 程序必须隐藏或关闭对话框 (通常是为了响应某些用户操作) ，然后才能向调用程序进行输入。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序使用户能够在控件内打开 ( rtf) 文件 。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将属性初始化为其默认值。The parameterless constructor initializes properties to their default values. 创建新的时 ， 属性设置为，属性设置为 空字符串 ( "" ) ，将 属性设置为空字符串，并将 属性设置为 `true` 。When a new is created, the property is set to , the property is set to an empty string (""), the property is set to an empty string, and the property is set to `true`. 通常，在创建新的后， 将设置 为从中开始浏览的位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. 或者，您可以将设置 为最初选择的子文件夹的路径 。Optionally, you can set the to the path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 还可以选择将属性设置 为向用户提供其他说明。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最后，调用 方法以向用户显示对话框。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 当对话框关闭并且中的对话框结果 为时 ， 将是一个字符串，其中包含指向所选文件夹的路径。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 是模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它会阻止应用程序的其余部分，直到用户选择了一个文件夹。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 当对话框模式显示时，无输入 (键盘或鼠标单击) 可能发生，但对话框中的对象除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 程序必须隐藏或关闭对话框 (通常是为了响应某些用户操作) ，然后才能向调用程序进行输入。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序使用户能够在控件内打开 ( rtf) 文件 。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从其开始浏览的根文件夹。

span.span: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有指定的文件夹以及其下的所有子文件夹将显示在对话框中，并可供选择。Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box and be selectable. 属性以及 将确定在显示对话框时所选文件夹的内容，只要 是 (或更准确的子文件夹的绝对路径 ，指向) 所表示的 shell 命名空间的子文件夹 。The property, along with , determines what the selected folder will be when the dialog box is displayed, as long as is an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序使用户能够在控件内打开 ( rtf) 文件 。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectedPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectedPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用户选定的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.

value.span: 对话框中选定的第一个文件夹或用户选定的最后一个文件夹的路径。

span.span: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog box or the last folder selected by the user.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 显示对话框之前设置了该属性，则具有此路径的文件夹将为所选文件夹，只要将 设置为 (或更准确的子文件夹的绝对路径 ，则指向) 所表示的 shell 命名空间的子文件夹 。If the property is set before showing the dialog box, the folder with this path will be the selected folder, as long as is set to an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). 如果 返回 ，即用户单击 **"确定"** 按钮，则 属性将返回一个字符串，其中包含指向所选文件夹的路径。If the returns , meaning the user clicked the **OK** button, the property will return a string containing the path to the selected folder. 如果 返回 ，表示用户已从对话框取消，则此属性的值与在显示对话框之前的值相同。If returns , meaning the user canceled out of the dialog box, this property will have the same value that it had prior to displaying the dialog box. 如果用户选择的文件夹不具有物理路径 (例如，我的电脑) ，则将禁用对话框上的 **"确定"** 按钮。If the user selects a folder that does not have a physical path (for example, My Computer), the **OK** button on the dialog box will be disabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序使用户能够在控件内打开 ( rtf) 文件 。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示“新建文件夹”按钮是否显示在文件夹浏览对话框中\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **New Folder** button appears in the folder browser dialog box.

value.span: 如果在对话框中显示 " **新建文件夹** " 按钮，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if the **New Folder** button is shown in the dialog box; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为时 `true` ，将显示 " **新建文件夹** " 按钮，为用户提供创建文件夹的机会。When is `true`, the **New Folder** button is visible, giving the user a chance to create a folder. 当用户单击 " **新建文件夹** " 按钮时，将创建一个新文件夹，并提示用户指定文件夹名称。When the user clicks the **New Folder** button, a new folder is created and the user is prompted to specify the folder name. 树中的选定节点将成为新文件夹的父节点。The selected node in the tree becomes the parent of the new folder. " **新建文件夹** " 按钮的实际标题可能因操作系统而异The actual caption of the **New Folder** button can vary depending upon the operating system > [!IMPORTANT] > 将设置 为 `false` 在 Windows 2000 上不起作用。Setting to `false` does not work on Windows 2000. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序使用户能够在控件内打开 ( rtf) 文件 。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将 属性的值用作 Vista 样式对话框的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the value of the property as the dialog title for Vista style dialogs.

summary.span: 此属性对旧样式对话框不起任何作用。

span.span: This property has no effect on old style dialogs.

value.span: 如果将属性的值用作 对话框标题，则为; 如果将值作为附加文本添加到对话框，则为。

span.span: if the value of the property is used as the dialog title; if the value is added as additional text to the dialog.
The default is .
